[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Variable(
            BracedVariableVariable(
                BracedVariableVariable {
                    start: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 7,
                        position: 6,
                    },
                    variable: Literal(
                        String(
                            LiteralString {
                                value: "'foo'",
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 1,
                                    column: 9,
                                    position: 8,
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    end: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 14,
                        position: 13,
                    },
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 15,
                position: 14,
            },
        ),
    },
]
